The Tale of the Sun and Moon

wikitext.*:
'''Lake Irtinsa''' was a body of water in [[Valinor]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.

It was built by the [[Valar]] following the creation of the [[Sun]] and [[Moon]], and was located just south of [[Valmar]]. It was surrounded by dark [[yews]] set as a maze, and its walls were made of "silver and white marbles". It was also where the Vala [[Irmo|LÃ³rien]] hoarded the dew of the [[Moon|Rose of Silpion]].<ref>{{LT1|VIII}}, p. 193</ref>
